Climate-smart way to reach ski resorts in Lapland

CONVENIENT FURTHER CONNECTIONS

Our night trains take you from Turku, Tampere, Helsinki and several minor stations to Lapland and back. Convenient bus connections take you straight to the ski resorts from the Oulu, Rovaniemi, Kolari and Kemijärvi stations.

On track – follow the train traffic

The new traffic bulletin combines the Live Train Tracker Map, information about track work of the FTIA as well as questions and answers related to traffic disruptions. With the new track work search, you can locate any track work on your route quickly.
